title: New: Vinyl Jacket – Safari
body:
Newcastle quartet **Vinyl Jacket** exploded back into life towards the tail end of last year, and massively impressed at a sold-out gig in their hometown.

With another show (sold out in advance, sorry guys) on Monday evening, they’ve dropped new track _Safari_, lifted from their forthcoming EP of the same name. As addictive, danceable and as purely downright enjoyable as the other two cuts we’ve heard so far ([Jupiter](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/25616-video-vinyl-jacket-jupiter/), [Corona](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/26081-premiere-vinyl-jacket-corona/)), **Vinyl Jacket** are hot property right now.
